org.sbrubbles.conditio

Interface Restart.Option

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Resume, UseValue
    Enclosing interface:
    Restart<R>

    public static interface Restart.Option
    Serves both as input for restarts, and a way to select which restart to use: the earliest-bound one in the stack which accepts it.

    This is merely a marker interface, with no fields or methods of its own. Implementations typically hold extra fields and data.

    See Also:
    Restarts
